segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman totally absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not paying attention to anything else around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, and water is gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the floor, and that puddle is getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she steps wrong, she could slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good over by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll come tumbling down with cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, her arm stretched out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's probably excited to get her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden, so serene compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup feels like an accident waiting to occur.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the cabinets will be a nightmare to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR
